name: Classic Fade
description: A timeless fade that never goes out of style
maintenanceTips: Ask for a clean taper and keep the neckline sharp between visits.
Get a fade touchup every 2-3 weeks for optimal freshness.
Use a light styling cream to maintain texture.

name: Buzz Cut
description: Clean and simple, perfect for low maintenance
maintenanceTips: Keep the guard length consistent and refresh every 2-3 weeks.
Use a moisturizing scalp treatment to prevent dryness.
Perfect for active lifestyles and hot weather.

name: Pompadour
description: Bold and stylish with volume on top
maintenanceTips: Use a blow dryer and matte pomade to keep the height balanced.
Apply product to damp hair and blow dry upward for volume.
Regular trims every 3-4 weeks maintain the shape.

name: Undercut
description: Modern and edgy with short sides
maintenanceTips: Keep the sides tight and clean around the ears for sharp contrast.
Touch up the disconnect line every 2 weeks.
Use texturizing product on top for modern styling.

name: Crew Cut
description: Professional and neat for any occasion
maintenanceTips: Brush forward on top and keep the taper clean every few weeks.
A classic choice for professional settings.
Minimal styling required - wash and go.

name: Slicked Back
description: Sleek and polished for a sophisticated look
maintenanceTips: Use a light shine pomade and comb backward for a sleek finish.
Apply product to damp hair for best hold.
Perfect for formal occasions and professional settings.

name: Textured Top
description: Messy texture with clean sides
maintenanceTips: Use sea salt spray and pinch sections for loose, natural texture.
Blow dry with fingers for added volume and movement.
Ideal for casual, everyday styling.

name: Quiff
description: Voluminous front with tapered sides
maintenanceTips: Blow dry the front up and back, then set with a matte paste.
Work product through midlengths and ends for hold.
Versatile style suitable for various occasions.

name: Fade
description: Fades down to skin with length on top
maintenanceTips: Keep the blend clean and refresh the fade every 2 weeks.
Regular maintenance ensures crisp lines.
Great for all hair types and textures.

name: Mid Fade
description: Fade starts at mid-head height
maintenanceTips: Ask for a soft transition at the mid point for balanced contrast.
Perfect middle ground between low and high fades.
Maintains a professional yet modern appearance.

name: High Fade
description: Fade starts higher for more contrast
maintenanceTips: Keep the top textured and taper the sides often for sharp contrast.
Dramatic style statement with bold definition.
Require frequent trims to maintain the look.

name: Skin Fade
description: Clean fade all the way to skin
maintenanceTips: Get edge-ups between cuts to keep the skin fade crisp.
Most aggressive fade style with maximum contrast.
Best maintained with weekly touch-ups.

name: Temple Fade
description: Fade concentrated around temples
maintenanceTips: Blend the temples cleanly and keep the lineup sharp.
Subtle fade perfect for conservative styles.
Great for maintaining length while adding definition.

name: Side Part
description: Classic side part with defined line
maintenanceTips: Maintain a clean parting line and keep the sides tapered.
Timeless style suitable for all ages.
Use a fine-tooth comb to define the part.

name: Curly Top
description: Embraces natural curls with clean sides
maintenanceTips: Hydrate curls and keep the sides clean with regular trims.
Use curl-enhancing products to define texture.
Embrace your natural curl pattern.

name: Afro
description: Full and voluminous natural afro
maintenanceTips: Moisturize regularly and shape evenly to keep volume balanced.
Pick out with a wide-tooth comb for even distribution.
Celebrate your natural texture and volume.

name: Box Braids
description: Intricate protective braided style
maintenanceTips: Keep the scalp hydrated and wrap at night to reduce frizz.
Long-lasting protective style for natural hair.
Apply light oil to scalp for moisture.

name: Twists
description: Twisted locks with defined pattern
maintenanceTips: Use light oil and retwist edges as needed for definition.
Protective style that lasts 4-6 weeks.
Keep scalp clean and moisturized.

name: Cornrows
description: Neat rows of braids close to scalp
maintenanceTips: Keep the scalp clean and avoid heavy product buildup.
Classic protective style with versatile patterns.
Can last 2-4 weeks with proper care.

name: Dreadlocks
description: Signature locked and twisted style
maintenanceTips: Retwist roots regularly and keep locks moisturized.
Iconic style representing cultural heritage.
Requires commitment and regular maintenance.

name: Man Bun
description: Long hair styled into a top knot
maintenanceTips: Keep the ends trimmed and use conditioner to reduce frizz.
Versatile style that can be worn up or down.
Use quality hair ties to prevent breakage.

name: Long & Layered
description: Strategic layers for movement and flow
maintenanceTips: Use lightweight layers and regular trims to prevent split ends.
Perfect for adding dimension and movement.
Style with texturizing spray for natural volume.

name: Mohawk
description: Bold statement with tall center strip
maintenanceTips: Use strong hold product and keep the sides faded clean.
Edgy style that makes a bold statement.
Requires frequent side maintenance.

name: Spiky
description: Sharp and edgy spikes throughout
maintenanceTips: Use a matte clay and dry the hair upward for texture.
Fun and playful style with youthful energy.
Work product through with fingers for definition.

name: French Crop
description: Short with textured fringe on top
maintenanceTips: Keep the fringe textured and the sides tapered for balance.
Modern European-inspired style.
Low maintenance with stylish appeal.
